category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MRMDefaultItemType
preference.preference_description: Defines the Item type selected as default in the "New Resource" dialog in the Resource Manager application, in case no resource is opened and the preference "MRMItemTypes" is not defined. Values must be a valid Item type. The default value is "Mfg0MENCTool".
